item.title: About my 2022
item.description: Ok I will start blogging I got laid off last December. The whole team, actually. I thought it would be easier to get a new job. I was wrong. The market right now if full of excellent engineers looking for a new role. I am competent but far from competent as the most competent engineer I worked with. This engineer got laid off the same time I did. He’s still looking for a job.
